entry.title: LLM-driven robot security
entry.content:
Introduction

As Embodied AI has gaining increasing popularity, tremendous impressive works have explored the brand new field of LLM-driven robot, like VoxPoser from FeiFei Li et al.,SayCan from Google. The highlight of this type of robot exists in the decision making by large AI model, ranging from large language model, visual-and-language model to visual navigation model, refreshing the control center and process.

Pioneers broke the new ground and more relative assurance should be equipped. Although the security of LLMs has been receiving increasing attention, security issues in the field of LLM-driven robots have not been considered yet. The purpose of this project is to build a universal and generalizable security testing platform targeting LLM-driven robot.

Overview

entry.title: Start up
entry.content:
Welcome to Junle’s Studio! Something more detail about this page will be illustrated in this post.

Introduction

This page works as a recording of what i’ m doing and what i’ m enjoying. I will upload some of my previous work and life tracking. Generally, it combines the usage of a research lab and a personal blog.

To be more readable, posts will attach some tags and be divided into different categories .

Categories:

  • Project
  • Publication
  • Paper reading
  • Reproduction
  • Application
  • Travel
  • Photograph
  • …

Discussion

As a full-time junior, maybe i can’t update frequently :( But i will do as i can.

What’s more, i will write in English as a practice to develop the writing habit, so…apologize for my poor writing in advance : )

I will add some new modules like message board to make sharing and commenting easier, anticipating your ideas and sharing!

Best wishes!
